revised_title: The Crimson Line of Phosphorescent Alumina: A Study on the Influence of Chromium
tldr: The author investigates the crimson line of phosphorescent alumina and its relationship with chromium. They find that the presence of chromium is essential for the production of the red fluorescence of alumina. The author conducts several experiments to purify the aluminum sulfate and separate chromium from alumina, proving that chromium plays a crucial role in the phosphorescence and spectrum of alumina.
